title: Arizona's Lifelines: The Story of SRP and CAP
subtitle: An interactive story of how water shaped the desert.

chapters.title: The Ancient Innovators
chapters.description: The Hohokam people engineered a vast and sophisticated canal network in the Salt River Valley centuries ago, laying the groundwork for modern irrigation.

chapters.title: Taming the Salt River
chapters.description: The Theodore Roosevelt Dam, completed in 1911, was a monumental feat of engineering that secured a reliable water source for the valley.
